long_description: The Patagonia Speedwork tights make quick work of wintertime training. Stretchy fabric features a smooth outer face to deliver light resistance; inside is brushed to wick moisture, dry quickly and provide a soft feel against skin. Formfitting design helps support muscles and enhances moisture movement; mesh panels at knees increase breathability. Flat waistband with internal drawcord allows a comfortable, personalized fit. Internal key pocket lies flat at hip. Reflective tape runs down outer leg and enhances visibility in dim light. The Patagonia Speedwork tights resist odors thanks to a specialized treatment.
short_description: The Patagonia Speedwork tights make quick work of wintertime training.
